Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory249.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Nian makes one last howl and collapses into the rainbow colors. The fireworks light up the night sky, filling the surroundings with warm light.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'Nian has been defeated. Looks like we have another good year ahead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'Thanks for your hard work.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "No problem. That's our job.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What should we do next?', 3: '14'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'We wait.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'Until the bell rings and the old year pasts.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As time goes by, the remaining bubbles begin to pop, lighting up the area.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab'}
{3: 'But such light is only momentary. Soon, the surrounding darkens again, leaving only the bonfire burning unyieldingly.'}
{3: 'The air also starts to get cold. You see white mist as you breathe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'Please put this on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why Polar Soldier?', 3: '27', 4: 'Where did you get this Polar Soldier from?', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: "It is perfect for a cold environment like this, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'From the equipment slot, of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'Someone asked me to bring this to you, saying it could provide a little help for you to survive through winter.', 4: '1'}
